title: Define Goals and Requirements
description: We start by clearly defining the goals and requirements of the AI project.

title: Collect and Prepare Data
description: Next, we gather and prepare the necessary data required for training the AI model.

title: Develop and Train the Model
description: We design and train the AI model using the collected data, refining it to achieve the desired performance.

title: Evaluate and Validate the Model
description: We evaluate the model's performance and validate its accuracy by testing it against different datasets and real-world scenarios.

title: Deploy and Monitor the Model
description: Finally, we deploy the AI model into the intended environment and continuously monitor its performance, making adjustments as needed.
